<content>
/* ==== Habillage SugarCube: interface Sauvegardes (UI.saves / &lt;&lt;saves&gt;&gt;) ==== */
/* Portée stricte dans #ui-dialog pour n'impacter que la boîte de dialogue */
#ui-dialog #saves {
    padding: 8px 6px 4px;
    color: #f5f5f5;
}

/* Bandeau d’info/contrôles (si présent) */
#ui-dialog #saves .controls,
#ui-dialog #saves #saves-controls {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 8px;
    align-items: center;
    margin: 6px 2px 10px;
}
#ui-dialog #saves .controls input[type="text"],
#ui-dialog #saves .controls input[type="search"],
#ui-dialog #saves #saves-controls input[type="text"],
#ui-dialog #saves #saves-controls input[type="search"] {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.06);
    color: #f5f5f5;
    border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.18);
    border-radius: 8px;
    padding: 8px 10px;
    outline: none;
}
#ui-dialog #saves .controls input[type="text"]:focus,
#ui-dialog #saves .controls input[type="search"]:focus,
#ui-dialog #saves #saves-controls input[type="text"]:focus,
#ui-dialog #saves #saves-controls input[type="search"]:focus {
    border-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.35);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(255,255,255,0.12);
}

/* Liste des slots */
#ui-dialog #saves #saves-list {
    margin-top: 8px;
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 10px;
    max-height: 60vh;
    overflow-y: auto;
    padding-right: 6px; /* pour laisser passer la scrollbar */
}
@media (min-width: 880px) {
    #ui-dialog #saves #saves-list {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    }
}

/* Carte slot / emplacement vide */
#ui-dialog #saves .slot,
#ui-dialog #saves .empty {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.06);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.12);
    border-radius: 10px;
    padding: 12px;
    transition: background .2s ease, border-color .2s ease, transform .05s ease;
}
#ui-dialog #saves .slot:hover,
#ui-dialog #saves .empty:hover {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.10);
    border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.20);
}
#ui-dialog #saves .slot:active,
#ui-dialog #saves .empty:active {
    transform: translateY(1px);
}

/* Titre/label/timestamp (noms courants utilisés par SugarCube) */
#ui-dialog #saves .label {
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 4px;
}
#ui-dialog #saves .title,
#ui-dialog #saves [class*="title"] {
    font-size: .95rem;
    opacity: .95;
}
#ui-dialog #saves .timestamp {
    margin-top: 4px;
    font-size: .9rem;
    opacity: .8;
}

/* Zone de boutons d’action par slot */
#ui-dialog #saves .buttons {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 8px;
    margin-top: 10px;
}

/* Style de base des boutons */
#ui-dialog #saves .buttons button,
#ui-dialog #saves button {
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    appearance: none;
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
    color: #f5f5f5;
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.18);
    border-radius: 8px;
    padding: 8px 12px;
    font-size: .95rem;
    line-height: 1.2;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: background .2s ease, transform .05s ease, border-color .2s ease;
}
#ui-dialog #saves .buttons button:hover,
#ui-dialog #saves button:hover {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.16);
}
#ui-dialog #saves .buttons button:active,
#ui-dialog #saves button:active {
    transform: translateY(1px);
}
#ui-dialog #saves .buttons button:focus-visible,
#ui-dialog #saves button:focus-visible {
    outline: 2px solid #ffffff;
    outline-offset: 2px;
}

/* Variantes d’importance: save (primaire), load (secondaire), delete (danger) */
#ui-dialog #saves .buttons .save,
#ui-dialog #saves .save {
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(46,204,113,.25), rgba(46,204,113,.18));
    border-color: rgba(46,204,113,.35);
}
#ui-dialog #saves .buttons .save:hover,
#ui-dialog #saves .save:hover {
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(46,204,113,.35), rgba(46,204,113,.25));
}

#ui-dialog #saves .buttons .load,
#ui-dialog #saves .load {
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(52,152,219,.25), rgba(52,152,219,.18));
    border-color: rgba(52,152,219,.35);
}
#ui-dialog #saves .buttons .load:hover,
#ui-dialog #saves .load:hover {
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(52,152,219,.35), rgba(52,152,219,.25));
}

#ui-dialog #saves .buttons .delete,
#ui-dialog #saves .delete {
    background: rgba(192,57,43,.10);
    color: #f2b6b2;
    border-color: rgba(192,57,43,.45);
}
#ui-dialog #saves .buttons .delete:hover,
#ui-dialog #saves .delete:hover {
    background: rgba(192,57,43,.20);
    color: #ffd6d3;
}

/* Petits ajustements divers (compat largeur, ellipsis) */
#ui-dialog #saves .buttons button,
#ui-dialog #saves button,
#ui-dialog #saves .slot,
#ui-dialog #saves .empty {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    max-width: 100%;
}
#ui-dialog #saves .title,
#ui-dialog #saves [class*="title"] {
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    white-space: nowrap;
}
</content>

375 |    const idx = $items.index($active);
376 |    if (idx === -1) return;
377 | 
378 |    function focusAt(i) {
379 |        const $t = $items.eq(i);
380 |        $items.attr('tabindex', '-1');
381 |        $t.attr('tabindex', '0').trigger('focus');
382 |    }
383 | 
384 |    switch (e.key) {
385 |        case 'ArrowDown':
386 |        case 'Down': // legacy
387 |            e.preventDefault();
388 |            focusAt((idx + 1) % $items.length);
389 |            break;
390 |        case 'ArrowUp':
391 |        case 'Up': // legacy
392 |            e.preventDefault();
393 |            focusAt((idx - 1 + $items.length) % $items.length);
394 |            break;
395 |        case 'Home':
396 |            e.preventDefault();
397 |            focusAt(0);
398 |            break;
399 |        case 'End':
400 |            e.preventDefault();
401 |            focusAt($items.length - 1);
402 |            break;
403 |        case 'Tab':
404 |            // Piège le focus dans le menu
405 |            if (!e.shiftKey && idx === $items.length - 1) {
406 |                e.preventDefault();
407 |                focusAt(0);
408 |            } else if (e.shiftKey && idx === 0) {
409 |                e.preventDefault();
410 |                focusAt($items.length - 1);
411 |            }
412 |            break;
413 |        default:
414 |            break;
415 |    }
416 | });

233 |         );
234 |     } catch (_ex) {}
235 | });
236 | 
237 | // Helpers d’ouverture/fermeture
238 | function hmOpen() {
239 |     $('body').addClass('menu-open');
240 |     $('#hamburger-menu').attr('aria-hidden', 'false');
241 |     $('#hamburger-btn').attr('aria-expanded', 'true');
242 |     // Prépare le roving tabindex et focus sur le premier item
243 |     setTimeout(function () {
244 |         const $items = $('#hamburger-menu .hm-item');
245 |         $items.attr('tabindex', '-1');
246 |         const $first = $items.first();
247 |         $first.attr('tabindex', '0').trigger('focus');
248 |     }, 0);
249 | }
250 | function hmClose() {
251 |     $('body').removeClass('menu-open');
252 |     $('#hamburger-menu').attr('aria-hidden', 'true');
253 |     $('#hamburger-btn').attr('aria-expanded', 'false');
254 |     // Rendre le focus au bouton pour l’accessibilité
255 |     $('#hamburger-btn').trigger('focus');
256 | }
257 | 
258 | // Toggle via bouton
259 | $(document).on('click', '#hamburger-btn', function (ev) {
260 |     ev.preventDefault();
261 |     ev.stopPropagation();
262 |     if ($('body').hasClass('menu-open')) {
263 |         hmClose();
264 |     } else {
265 |         hmOpen();
266 |     }
267 | });
268 | 
269 | // Fermer au clic hors du menu
270 | $(document).on('click', function (ev) {
271 |     if (!$('body').hasClass('menu-open')) return;
272 |     const $t = $(ev.target);
273 |     if ($t.closest('#hamburger-btn, #hamburger-menu, #ui-dialog, #ui-overlay').length) return;
274 |     hmClose();
275 | });
276 | 
277 | // Fermer avec Échap quand menu ouvert
278 | $(document).on('keydown', function (e) {
279 |     if (e.key === 'Escape' && $('body').hasClass('menu-open')) {
280 |         hmClose();
281 |     }
282 | });
283 | 
284 | // Actions du menu
285 | $(document).on('click', '#hamburger-menu .hm-item', function (ev) {
286 |    const $el = $(this);
287 |    const action = $el.data('action');
288 | 
289 |    // Lien externe (ex. GitHub): ne pas bloquer la navigation, mais fermer le menu
290 |    if (!action && $el.is('a[href]')) {
291 |        hmClose();
292 |        // Pour fiabilité cross‑browser, ouvrir explicitement si target défini
293 |        const href = $el.attr('href');
294 |        const target = $el.attr('target') || '_self';
295 |        if (href) {
296 |            ev.preventDefault();
297 |            try { window.open(href, target, target === '_blank' ? 'noopener,noreferrer' : undefined); } catch (_e) {}
298 |        }
299 |        return;
300 |    }
301 | 
302 |    // Actions internes: empêcher la navigation par défaut
303 |    ev.preventDefault();
304 | 
305 |    switch (action) {
306 |        case 'back':
307 |            hmClose();
308 |            if (window.SugarCube && SugarCube.Engine && typeof SugarCube.Engine.backward === 'function') {
309 |                SugarCube.Engine.backward();
310 |            }
311 |            break;
312 | 
313 |        case 'forward':
314 |            hmClose();
315 |            if (window.SugarCube && SugarCube.Engine && typeof SugarCube.Engine.forward === 'function') {
316 |                SugarCube.Engine.forward();
317 |            }
318 |            break;
319 | 
320 |        case 'saves':
321 |            hmClose();
322 |            // SugarCube: utiliser l’API officielle via le namespace SugarCube
323 |            if (window.SugarCube && SugarCube.UI && typeof SugarCube.UI.saves === 'function') {
324 |                try {
325 |                    SugarCube.UI.saves();
326 |                    return;
327 |                } catch (e) {
328 |                    console.error('[Hamburger] SugarCube.UI.saves() a échoué, tentative via Dialog:', e);
329 |                }
330 |            }
331 |            // Secondaire: ouvrir un Dialog et tenter la macro si présente, sinon message
332 |            if (window.SugarCube && SugarCube.Dialog) {
333 |                try {
334 |                    SugarCube.Dialog.setup('Sauvegardes / Chargements');
335 |                    if (SugarCube.Macro && ((SugarCube.Macro.has && SugarCube.Macro.has('saves')) || (SugarCube.Macro.get && SugarCube.Macro.get('saves')))) {
336 |                        if (typeof SugarCube.Dialog.wiki === 'function') {
337 |                            SugarCube.Dialog.wiki('<<saves>>');
338 |                        } else if (typeof SugarCube.Wikifier !== 'undefined') {
339 |                            new SugarCube.Wikifier(SugarCube.Dialog.body(), '<<saves>>');
340 |                        } else {
341 |                            $(SugarCube.Dialog.body()).append('<p>Interface de sauvegardes non disponible.</p>');
342 |                        }
343 |                    } else {
344 |                        $(SugarCube.Dialog.body()).append('<p>Interface de sauvegardes non disponible (macro <<saves>> absente). Utilisez SugarCube.UI.saves() ou vérifiez votre build SugarCube.</p>');
345 |                    }
346 |                    SugarCube.Dialog.open();
347 |                } catch (e2) {
348 |                    console.error('[Hamburger] Échec ouverture Dialog saves:', e2);
349 |                }
350 |            } else {
351 |                // Non-SugarCube (ex. Harlowe)
352 |                try { window.alert('Sauvegardes non disponibles dans ce format. Confirmez le format cible (SugarCube vs Harlowe).'); } catch (_e3) {}
353 |            }
354 |            break;
355 | 
356 |        case 'restart':
357 |            hmClose();
358 |            if (window.SugarCube && SugarCube.Engine && typeof SugarCube.Engine.restart === 'function') {
359 |                SugarCube.Engine.restart();
360 |            }
361 |            break;
362 | 
363 |        default:
364 |            break;
365 |    }
366 | });

368 | // Navigation clavier dans le menu hamburger (roving tabindex + piège de focus)
369 | $(document).on('keydown', function (e) {
370 |    if (!$('body').hasClass('menu-open')) return;
371 | 
372 |    const $active = $(document.activeElement);
373 | 
374 |    // Si le focus n'est pas dans le menu, intercepter Tab pour entrer dans le menu
375 |    if (!$active.closest('#hamburger-menu').length) {
376 |        if (e.key === 'Tab') {
377 |            const $items = $('#hamburger-menu .hm-item');
378 |            if ($items.length) {
379 |                e.preventDefault();
380 |                $items.attr('tabindex', '-1');
381 |                $items.first().attr('tabindex', '0').trigger('focus');
382 |            }
383 |        }
384 |        return;
385 |    }
386 | 
387 |    const $items = $('#hamburger-menu .hm-item');
388 |    const idx = $items.index($active);
389 |    if (idx === -1) return;
390 | 
391 |    function focusAt(i) {
392 |        const $t = $items.eq(i);
393 |        $items.attr('tabindex', '-1');
394 |        $t.attr('tabindex', '0').trigger('focus');
395 |    }
396 | 
397 |    switch (e.key) {
398 |        case 'ArrowDown':
399 |        case 'Down': // legacy
400 |            e.preventDefault();
401 |            focusAt((idx + 1) % $items.length);
402 |            break;
403 |        case 'ArrowUp':
404 |        case 'Up': // legacy
405 |            e.preventDefault();
406 |            focusAt((idx - 1 + $items.length) % $items.length);
407 |            break;
408 |        case 'Home':
409 |            e.preventDefault();
410 |            focusAt(0);
411 |            break;
412 |        case 'End':
413 |            e.preventDefault();
414 |            focusAt($items.length - 1);
415 |            break;
416 |        case 'Tab':
417 |            // Piège le focus dans le menu
418 |            if (!e.shiftKey && idx === $items.length - 1) {
419 |                e.preventDefault();
420 |                focusAt(0);
421 |            } else if (e.shiftKey && idx === 0) {
422 |                e.preventDefault();
423 |                focusAt($items.length - 1);
424 |            }
425 |            break;
426 |        default:
427 |            break;
428 |    }
429 | });
